A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie has nothing to do with the Skywalker Saga set up by George Lucas. It is taking a dump on the legacy of George Lucas franchise\, Star Wars. Imagine if JK Rowling sold Harry Potter to Universal Studios and made Harry Potter a woman who doesn't need to learn magic or The Wizarding School. People would be outraged. that's how I feel about these Trilogy sequel movies.
